title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 10 ยง 350.5 - APD guidance
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 10 ยง 350.5 - APD guidance

State Regulations

The Department shall make guidance available on its website
that includes: (a) APD submissions
specifications, including the data standards used and the method for reporting
to the Department. Submission specifications shall be developed with a goal of
minimizing burden on health care providers and third-party health care payers, including utilization of nationally standardized file formats where available
and feasible. (b) APD data access
and release policy, including security and usage requirements to become a data
user; requirements for maintaining privacy, confidentiality, and security; and
data release fee information. Data access and release requirements shall
include restrictions on the release of any information that could be used, alone or in combination with other reasonably available information, to
identify an individual who is a subject of the information, as well as
procedures for request of identifying data elements, including the project
application process established pursuant to subdivision (d) of section
350.3
of this Part. (c) Program operations policy, including
program purpose, scope and objectives, and general governance. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 10
ยง
350.5

Adopted

New

York State Register September 13, 2017/Volume XXXIX, Issue 37, eff. 9/13/2017

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
